message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling this product to you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm afraid $120 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer it to you for $135.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm glad we're close, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I can offer it to you for $130.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I can offer $128 for the product. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
